body:
Hello, this is another new idea, I bring to you the Water and Hopper iron transport.
This is the two things you can do. Water at beginning: You have to throw the items away and then the hopper at the end will grab the items and put automatcailly puts into the chest.
Here is the picture: http://i.imgur.com/VIOh36K.png.
 
 
If you liked this idea, make sure you can check other two previous ideas the hopper and water, Its your's to make somewhere thank you and here is the picture.
https://avicus.net/forums/5cd97bbd3-Hopper 
https://avicus.net/forums/b6c5d2138-Water
 
Thanks for watching. Peace
